quote: Reach for the stars so if you fall you land on a cloud.
author: Kanye West

quote: No you're not perfect but you're not your mistakes.
author: Kayne West

quote: You have every right to a beautiful life.
author: Selena Gomez

quote: I'ma keep running 'cause a winner don't quit on themselves.
author: Beyonce

quote: The world will see you the way you see you, and treat you the way you treat yourself.
author: Beyonce

quote: If you have no shadows then you're not standing in the light.
author: Lady Gaga

quote: You have to be unique and different to shine in your own way.
author: Lady Gaga

quote: Who I wanna be still seems so far away but I know I'm gonna get there someday.
author: Dierks Bentley

quote: I put my armor on, show you how strong how I am. I put my armor on, I'll show you that I am unstoppable.
author: Sia

quote: I'm like a rubberband until you pull too hard. I may snap and I move fast but you won't see me fall apart.
author: Sia

quote: Just really, really believe in what you're trying to do. Don't let people alter that. Let people advise you and lead you down paths to make smart decisions.
author: Luke Bryan

quote: Build your own pyramids, write your own hieroglyph.
author: Kendrick Lamar

quote: We all get distracted, the question is, would you bounce back or bounce backwards?
author: Kendrick Lamar

quote: I don't wanna be Jordan, I don't wanna be Bird or Isiah, I don't wanna be any of those guys. I want to look in the mirror and say I did it my way.
author: Allen Iverson

quote: I never worry about the problem. I worry about the solution.
author: Shaquille O'Neal

quote: I've had to learn to fight all my life. Got to learn to keep smiling. If you smile things will work out.
author: Serena Williams

quote: Even though you're fed up, you gotta keep your head up.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: Imma be what I set out to be, without a doubt undoubtedly.
author: Eminem

quote: The first step is you have to say that you can.
author: Will Smith

quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Sometimes it's the journey that teaches you a lot about your destination.
author: Drake

quote: Our greatest glory is not in falling but in rising every time we fall.
author: Sylvester Stallone

quote: Being different from everyone else just made me a lot stronger.
author: Drake

quote: You know what they say. Fool me once, strike one, but fool me twice.. strike three.
author: Michael Scott

quote: Being happy is the goal, but greatness is my mission.
author: Childish Gambino

quote: The motivation for me was them telling me what I couldn't be.
author: Jay Z

quote: I'm hungry for knowledge. The whole thing is to learn every day. To get brighter and brighter. That's what this world is about.
author: Jay Z

quote: I seen a baby cry, seconds later he laughs. The beauty of life's pain, pain never lasts.
author: J. Cole

quote: My mistakes are my biggest professors and learning life lessons.
author: Big Sean

quote: Dreams stopped being dreams when I turned 'em into goals.
author: Big Sean

quote: Cherish these nights, cherish these people. Life is a movie, but there'll never be a sequel.
author: Nicki Minaj

quote: Life is too short to live the same day twice. So each new day, make sure you live your life.
author: Machine Gun Kelly

quote: Why do we try so hard to fit in, when we were born to stand out?
author: Machine Gun Kelly

quote: Life without dreaming is a life without meaning.
author: Wale

quote: Let your dreams stay big and your worries stay small.
author: Rascal Flatts

quote: I hope you never look back but you never forget, all the ones who loved you and the place you left.
author: Rascal Flatts

quote: Don't believe in kings, believe in the Kingdom.
author: Chance the Rapper

quote: Everybody's somebody's everything.
author: Chance the Rapper
